metadata.title: CVE-2024-57637 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue in the dfe_unit_gb_dependant component of openlinkvirtuoso-opensource v7.2.11 allows attackers to cause a Denial of Service(DoS) via crafted SQL statements.

criterions.comment: virtuoso-opensource package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
